Text: I used to like WAF encodings... But since this 1024 x something, I don't know who does like this: those who look for small size prefer ~700MB, and those (like me) who want a minimum quality/size won't settle for less than 720p, which this ain't... Too bad!
Couldn't agree more. This resolution shouldn't even be in the Highres section.

Highres or not it looks good on my 42" TV.
audio is superb compared to other sources.
Thanks.
I'm sure it's fine on smaller TV's.
